meanings.definition: The act of not including something.
meanings.sent1: Her noninclusions in the team made her feel left out.
meanings.sent2: The noninclusions in the recipe caused it to taste different.
meanings.sent3: The noninclusions in the party guest list led to some unexpected surprises.
meanings.sent4: His noninclusions in the project were like missing puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The noninclusions in the painting left it feeling incomplete.

meanings.definition: The state of being left out or omitted.
meanings.sent1: The noninclusions of her name on the list surprised her.
meanings.sent2: His noninclusions from the meeting made him feel isolated.
meanings.sent3: The noninclusions in the story added a mysterious twist.
meanings.sent4: The noninclusions in the plan left room for unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The noninclusions in the group photo made it look incomplete.
